name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Proficient Senior Windows Engineer with over 9 years of experience in endpoint management and automation. Expertise in leveraging **Active Directory**, **Microsoft Intune**, and **VMWare Workspace One** for effective systems management and deployment. Skilled in scripting using **PowerShell** and **VBScript**, with a strong foundation in ITIL practices to enhance service delivery and operations. Demonstrated ability to develop customer-oriented solutions while optimizing workflows and processes, ensuring seamless integration and robust performance. Known for collaborating with cross-functional teams to successfully lead projects from inception to completion.

experience.responsibilities:
Spearheaded automation efforts using **PowerShell** and **VBScript** to improve scripting efficiency for endpoint management tasks.
Developed efficient deployment scripts utilizing **Microsoft Installer** and **Flexera Admin Studio** to streamline software installation processes across **Windows 11 Enterprise** environments.
Implemented **Microsoft Intune** for streamlined endpoint management and security compliance, ensuring a customer-oriented approach to device management and support.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate **Active Directory** solutions, enhancing user access management and security protocols.
Utilized **VMWare Workspace One** for comprehensive endpoint and device management, improving user satisfaction ratings by **30%**.
Integrated ITIL best practices in daily operations to streamline processes and enhance service delivery.
Automated reporting and monitoring scripts to enhance visibility into system performance, leading to a **25%** reduction in manual oversight.
Led training sessions on endpoint troubleshooting and scripting techniques for team members, contributing to skill development and knowledge sharing.
Ensured compliance with organizational policies through consistent application of security protocols and procedures.

Utilized **PowerShell** scripting to automate Windows 11 Enterprise deployment processes, enhancing operational efficiency by **20%**.
Managed endpoint management solutions through **VMWare Workspace One** and **Microsoft Intune**, ensuring smooth integration and compliance.
Configured and administered Active Directory for user management and security policies, improving access control by **30%**.
Developed scripting solutions using **VBScript** to streamline software installation processes via **Microsoft Installer**, reducing manual intervention by **50%**.
Implemented automation strategies that led to a decrease in incident resolution time, reflecting customer-oriented service delivery.
Utilized **Flexera Admin Studio** for application packaging and deployment, significantly reducing setup time for new software releases.
Participated in ITIL processes to enhance service management efficiency, aligning with best practices in IT operations.
Conducted training sessions for team members on scripting best practices, resulting in improved skill levels across the team.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and ensure stakeholder satisfaction with implemented solutions.
Led efforts to document and optimize endpoint management processes, facilitating better compliance and audit readiness.

Implemented endpoint management solutions utilizing **PowerShell** and **Microsoft Intune** to enhance productivity within the organization.
Automated deployment and configuration tasks through **VBScript** and **scripting**, streamlining IT operations and reducing manual efforts by 30%.
Managed user access and security protocols using **Active Directory**, successfully provisioning 400+ accounts while ensuring compliance with company policies.
Utilized **VMWare Workspace One** to provide a unified endpoint management experience, integrating 250 devices to ensure seamless connectivity and security.
Conducted thorough training on **Microsoft Installer**, resulting in a 25% reduction in software deployment time across various teams.
Led initiatives focused on ITIL best practices, improving incident response times by 15% and enhancing customer satisfaction.
Developed automation scripts that reduced repetitive tasks, contributing to a 40% increase in overall team efficiency.
Played a pivotal role in incident resolution, maintaining a customer-oriented focus and ensuring service availability above 99%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure all technical documentation is up to date, thus improving knowledge transfer and project delivery timelines.
